sqlMap.select: SELECT ITEM_GRP_ID FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RN, ITEM_GRP_ID, ITEM_GRP_NM FROM ( SELECT ITEM_GRP_ID, ITEM_GRP_NM FROM BSC_LEVEL_ITEM_GRP WHERE YEAR = #findYear# ORDER BY SORT_ORDER ) ) WHERE RN = 1
SELECT ITEM_GRP_ID FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RN, ITEM_GRP_ID, ITEM_GRP_NM FROM ( SELECT ITEM_GRP_ID, ITEM_GRP_NM FROM BSC_LEVEL_ITEM_GRP WHERE YEAR = #findYear# ORDER BY SORT_ORDER ) ) WHERE RN = 2
SELECT ITEM_GRP_NM FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RN, ITEM_GRP_ID, ITEM_GRP_NM FROM ( SELECT ITEM_GRP_ID, ITEM_GRP_NM FROM BSC_LEVEL_ITEM_GRP WHERE YEAR = #findYear# ORDER BY SORT_ORDER ) ) WHERE RN = 2
SELECT GRADE , GRADE_NM FROM BSC_LEVEL_GRADE WHERE YEAR = #findYear# ORDER BY SORT_ORDER

SELECT A.YEAR , A.ITEM_GRP_ID , A.ITEM_GRP_NM , B.GRADE ,
MAX(CASE WHEN C.GRADE = '$gradeArr[]$' THEN D.ADJUST_RATE END) $gradeArr[]$
, B.SORT_ORDER , COUNT(A.ITEM_GRP_ID) OVER(PARTITION BY A.YEAR, A.ITEM_GRP_ID ORDER BY A.ITEM_GRP_ID) AS GROUP_CNT , ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY A.YEAR, A.ITEM_GRP_ID ORDER BY B.SORT_ORDER) AS GROUP_INDEX FROM BSC_LEVEL_ITEM_GRP A LEFT OUTER JOIN BSC_LEVEL_GRADE B ON A.YEAR = B.YEAR LEFT OUTER JOIN BSC_LEVEL_GRADE C ON A.YEAR = C.YEAR LEFT OUTER JOIN BSC_LEVEL_ADJUST_RATE D ON A.YEAR = D.YEAR AND D.ITEM_GRP_ID = A.ITEM_GRP_ID AND D.MATCH_ITEM_GRP_ID = #secondGradeId# AND B.GRADE = D.GRADE AND C.GRADE = D.MATCH_GRADE WHERE A.YEAR = '$findYear$' AND A.ITEM_GRP_ID = '$firstGradeId$'
B.GRADE = #grade#
AND A.DELETE_DT IS NULL GROUP BY A.YEAR, A.ITEM_GRP_ID, A.ITEM_GRP_NM, B.GRADE, B.SORT_ORDER ORDER BY B.SORT_ORDER ASC

SELECT YEAR , ITEM_GRP_ID , GRADE , MATCH_ITEM_GRP_ID , MATCH_GRADE , ADJUST_RATE FROM BSC_LEVEL_ADJUST_RATE WHERE 1 = 1 AND YEAR = #year# AND ITEM_GRP_ID = #itemGrpId# AND GRADE = #grade# AND MATCH_ITEM_GRP_ID = #matchItemGrpId# AND MATCH_GRADE = #matchGrade#
sqlMap.update: DELETE FROM BSC_LEVEL_ADJUST_RATE WHERE YEAR = #year# AND ITEM_GRP_ID = #itemGrpId# AND GRADE = #grade#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO BSC_LEVEL_ADJUST_RATE ( YEAR , ITEM_GRP_ID , GRADE , MATCH_ITEM_GRP_ID , MATCH_GRADE , ADJUST_RATE , CREATE_DT ) VALUES ( #year# , #itemGrpId# , #grade# , #matchItemGrpId# , #matchGrade# , #adjustRate# , SYSDATE )
sqlMap.update: DELETE FROM BSC_LEVEL_ADJUST_RATE WHERE 1 = 1 AND YEAR = #year# AND ITEM_GRP_ID = #itemGrpId# AND GRADE = #grade#
